ygData.subject: Re: Testament of Vanear for Dark Elves ***spoiler***
ygData.msgSnippet: Last time I checked. Pages are no drop. The container however is not NO DROP
ygData.messageBody:
Last time I checked.

Pages are no drop.
The container however is not NO DROP

Chrisstauf k wrote:
>
> From: "Chrisstauf k" <chrisstauf@...>
>
> The only thing that is no drop is the actual end product. You can do
> whatever you want right up to the point that you hit the combine button. You
> can bribe somebody to go into qeynos for you if you need to.
>
> chrisstauf of the lightbringers
> cleric of the 18th circle
>
> >From: Woland Grauensturm <woland@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Testament of Vanear for Dark Elves ***spoiler***
> >Date: Tue, 26 Oct 1999 01:33:18 +0200
> >
> >
> >Is the page or container given by the guy in Qeynos also NO DROP?
> >
> >And is the testament NO DROP?
> >
> >// JS
> >
> >At 1999-10-25, you wrote:
> >>From: "Mike Schlagenhauf" <trelane@...>
> >>
> >>Umm, you forgot one part (although it should be blatantly obvious). Once
> >>you get both pages in the book, hit "combine." Otherwise, you won't be
> >>able
> >>to actually equip the book, and it will have no effect other than taking
> >>up
> >>space in your inventory. :)
> >>
> >>Lohre Soulsaver
> >>Bristlebane Server
> >>
> >>----- Original Message -----
> >>From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
> >>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> >>Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 2:46 PM
> >>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Testament of Vanear for Dark Elves ***spoiler***
> >>
> >>
> >> > From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
> >> >
> >> > Very well then,
> >> > (***spoiler***)
> >> >
> >> >
> >> >
> >> >
> >> >
> >> > I have heard that this quest begins in Erudin, but that you need not go
> >> > there to do it. This is ALL I did:
> >> >
> >> > 1. Go to Highpass and find the Smuggler's camp. If you go to the Inn
> >>and
> >> > jump in the water, you will see a hole in the side of the wall, swim
> >>through
> >> > and you will be there.
> >> >
> >> > 2. Find Dynil (forgot his last name) who spawns under a little tent. He
> >> > looks just like a Qeynos guard with a helm on so you can't miss him. He
> >>is
> >> > around 13-15 level. When you kill him he drops "Page 30 of a book" (no
> >> > drop). (NOTE: His spawn time is right at 7 hours)
> >> >
> >> > 3. Go to Qeynos and find Moordoro (this is where i went invis). He is
> >>in a
> >> > building to the right as soon as you enter the North gate. Just walk up
> >>to
> >> > him and give him 2gp. He will hand you the Testament of Vanear
> >>Container
> >> > (2-slot container). Then you give him 4gp and he will deal you a card
> >>from
> >> > his deck. (NOTE: You MUST give him GOLD pieces) When he deals you a
> >>Jester,
> >> > give it back to him and he will give you "Page 34 of a book".
> >> >
> >> > 4. Place both pages into the container and, Voila!, you have a
> >>Testament
> >>of
> >> > Vanear. Easy!
> >> >
> >> > Anymore questions, let me know.
> >> >
> >> >
> >> > > ok, how does one do the quest then? :) that would be my best
> >>question
> >>to
> >> > > ask...I've heard it touched on and not seen any answers as to how to
> >> > > complete it!
> >> > >
> >> > > Bann
> >> > >
> >> > >
> >> >
> >> > >
> >>
> >>
> ><< text3.html >>
>
>
